Name: Scary Maze
About the game: Scary Maze is an exciting horror-action hybrid where you run through a maze killing zombies, ready to eat you as soon as they can. Your only way to fight back is your trusty slingshot. This game will keep you on the edge of your seat, looking for your next zombie. Trailer music Gloom Horizon by Kevin MacLeod
